column4: Hi, I'm trying to get Conky to work on Xubuntu.  I try to find the dir /usr/share/doc/conky/examples/, but the "examples" folder isn't there, and i need to edit the file .conkyrc.  Any ideas?
That's the file I can't find.  Do I just need to download that file somewhere online, create an "examples" folder myself, and go from there?
http://conky.sourceforge.net/screenshots.html has screenshots with .conkyrc's given (link below each screenshot)
if you want to try different ones without constantly renaming you can run "conky -c name_of_conky_file"
